column5: Hi everyone,  I'm trying to decide what brand of mono to use for my medium depth cranking setup.  What do you guys recommend?  TIA
Try Trilene XL or XT...It seems to last a long time on the reel unlike some other brands....  Cheers !!
Great choice Chris!!! I'll second that Leechman
Seems for once I'm using the right stuff
I've been using XXX mono for 2yrs from spiderwire and this mono is amazing.  Very limp, super strong, and thin diameter vs other mono of same pound test.  Check it out you will love it.
I'm using 6lb spiderwire - find it stays on reel longer than triline
